title: Intentions for the Week
description: Intentions for the Week- Week 47 in 2024 Hi hiiiiii! Happy Monday, folks! Reporting live from Oregon. I’ve had a weekend of hanging out with lady friends from college. It was impromptu and much needed. I am going to figure out how much I can get done on the road this week. Wish me luck!  Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work on currently workbook check in with calendar  art time doc appt floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed send thank you note work on package for E & HJH quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos  edit/upload podcast  brainstorm recipes post School Lunch template recipe testing- pumpkin! work on Currently Workbook  make video for currently workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit laundry  litterboxes yard work water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work on currently workbook check in with calendar  art time doc appt floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed send thank you note work on package for E & HJH quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos  edit/upload podcast  brainstorm recipes post School Lunch template recipe testing- pumpkin! work on Currently Workbook  make video for currently workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit laundry  litterboxes yard work water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling   Posts to Inspire: Sweet Potato Cornbread Chicken Parmesan Meatballs Instant Pot Jalapeno Mac & Cheese Sausage Kale Pizza Breads Crispy Gluten Chicken Nugget    Carrot Coconut Soup Kale Soyrizo Tacos    If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood:   Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!  You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Look, Mom! I made a video:   Need extra help? Join my accountability group-  SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!    The post Intentions for the Week appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: Intentions for the Week is a weekly TO DO list/planner started by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean.com & The Handwriting Club!
text: Intentions for the Week- Week 47 in 2024 Hi hiiiiii! Happy Monday, folks! Reporting live from Oregon. I’ve had a weekend of hanging out with lady friends from college. It was impromptu and much needed. I am going to figure out how much I can get done on the road this week. Wish me luck!  Here are my Intentions for the Week!  Intentions this Week  This week’s intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work on currently workbook check in with calendar  art time doc appt floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed send thank you note work on package for E & HJH quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos  edit/upload podcast  brainstorm recipes post School Lunch template recipe testing- pumpkin! work on Currently Workbook  make video for currently workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit laundry  litterboxes yard work water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling Last Week’s Intentions:  Mind/Body morning pages/ morning routine 30 minutes no screen after wakeup fill out my Intentions for the week calendar keep track of what I eat in my food journal keep track of movement on Apple watch workout every day work on currently workbook check in with calendar  art time doc appt floss daily horoscope connect with my spirit  work in my hobonichi cousin outdoor time/hike? pull cards/journal/video watch how much time I spend on the phone tweeze things paint nails eating meeting clean house + phone a friend use my diffuser steam facial take vitamins  stay hydrated  read before bed send thank you note work on package for E & HJH quality time with my cats get enough sleep Work: intentions for the week  i love lists  record stuff my everyday life hope circuit check in SELF Check In!  upload/edit photos  edit/upload podcast  brainstorm recipes post School Lunch template recipe testing- pumpkin! work on Currently Workbook  make video for currently workbook  work on THC clean up office package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!) catch up pinning on my Pinterest account Tailwind meal prep/make video catch up on social media clean up workspace  bookkeeping/pay bills emails  go to P.O. Box Home grocery shop declutter shit laundry  litterboxes yard work water indoor plants  water plants on deck go through pantry  compost/worm bin wash dish towels clean kitchen clear off stairs clear off dining room table vac stairs clean bathrooms pickup the deck clean out car straighten up garage  refill pill case garbage/recycling   Posts to Inspire: Sweet Potato Cornbread Chicken Parmesan Meatballs Instant Pot Jalapeno Mac & Cheese Sausage Kale Pizza Breads Crispy Gluten Chicken Nugget  Carrot Coconut Soup Kale Soyrizo Tacos  If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations!  Here’s a mood: Mantra for the week! Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action.  My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year! I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder.  It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack!  Look, Mom!  I made a video:   Need extra help? Join my accountability group-  SELF-CHECK-IN We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together.  Those are my Intentions for the Week!  Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
html:
Intentions for the Week- Week 47 in 2024

Hi hiiiiii! Happy Monday, folks! Reporting live from Oregon. I’ve had a weekend of hanging out with lady friends from college. It was impromptu and much needed. I am going to figure out how much I can get done on the road this week. Wish me luck! 

Here are my Intentions for the Week! 

Intentions this Week 

This week’s intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • workout every day
  • work on currently workbook
  • check in with calendar 
  • art time
  • doc appt
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • eating meeting
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • send thank you note
  • work on package for E & HJH
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • hope circuit check in
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos 
  • edit/upload podcast 
  • brainstorm recipes
  • post School Lunch template
  • recipe testing- pumpkin!
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • make video for currently workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • meal prep/make video
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • declutter shit
  • laundry 
  • litterboxes
  • yard work
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • wash dish towels
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean bathrooms
  • pickup the deck
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling

Last Week’s Intentions: 

Mind/Body

  • morning pages/ morning routine
  • 30 minutes no screen after wakeup
  • fill out my Intentions for the week calendar
  • keep track of what I eat in my food journal
  • keep track of movement on Apple watch
  • workout every day
  • work on currently workbook
  • check in with calendar 
  • art time
  • doc appt
  • floss daily
  • horoscope
  • connect with my spirit 
  • work in my hobonichi cousin
  • outdoor time/hike?
  • pull cards/journal/video
  • watch how much time I spend on the phone
  • tweeze things
  • paint nails
  • eating meeting
  • clean house + phone a friend
  • use my diffuser
  • steam facial
  • take vitamins 
  • stay hydrated 
  • read before bed
  • send thank you note
  • work on package for E & HJH
  • quality time with my cats
  • get enough sleep

Work:

  • intentions for the week 
  • i love lists 
  • record stuff
  • my everyday life
  • hope circuit check in
  • SELF Check In! 
  • upload/edit photos 
  • edit/upload podcast 
  • brainstorm recipes
  • post School Lunch template
  • recipe testing- pumpkin!
  • work on Currently Workbook 
  • make video for currently workbook 
  • work on THC
  • clean up office
  • package/ship orders for The Handwriting Club  (THANK YOU!)
  • catch up pinning on my Pinterest account
  • Tailwind
  • meal prep/make video
  • catch up on social media
  • clean up workspace 
  • bookkeeping/pay bills
  • emails 
  • go to P.O. Box

Home

  • grocery shop
  • declutter shit
  • laundry 
  • litterboxes
  • yard work
  • water indoor plants 
  • water plants on deck
  • go through pantry 
  • compost/worm bin
  • wash dish towels
  • clean kitchen
  • clear off stairs
  • clear off dining room table
  • vac stairs
  • clean bathrooms
  • pickup the deck
  • clean out car
  • straighten up garage 
  • refill pill case
  • garbage/recycling
  •  

Posts to Inspire:

Sweet Potato Cornbread

Chicken Parmesan Meatballs

Instant Pot Jalapeno Mac & Cheese

Sausage Kale Pizza Breads

Crispy Gluten Chicken Nugget 

Carrot Coconut Soup

Kale Soyrizo Tacos 

If you make a recipe from Shutterbean, tag me on Instagram! I’d love to see your creations! 

Here’s a mood:

Mantra for the week!

Feeling stuck? Make a list! Write down your intentions for the week to help hold you accountable for action. 

My Intentions for the Week Calendar can help!!   You can start it at any time of the year!

I also have a printable if you work well with a one-sheet. Here it is in a binder. 

It’s part of my Time Management Printable pack! 

Look, Mom!  I made a video:

 

Need extra help? Join my accountability group- 

SELF-CHECK-IN

We spend Sunday mornings 9:00 AM PST-10:30 AM- PST working on our calendars and checking in together. 

Those are my Intentions for the Week! 

Wishing you a productive week. Take good care of YOU!
